vulnerability.name: USN-5846-1
vulnerability.description: Jan-Niklas Sohn discovered that the X.Org X Server incorrectly handled certain memory operations. An attacker could possibly use these issues to cause the X Server to crash, execute arbitrary code, or escalate privileges.

statements.status_notes: X.Org X Server could be made to crash or run programs as the administrator if it received specially crafted input.
